title: Pixel 5 eSIM activation on Hungarian Telecom (T-Mobile) error
content:
Hi, I have tried to activate a Pixel 5 purchased in Europe on a Hungarian Telecom (T-Mobile) eSIM but got the dreaded "Network not activated" error.
Is this a Google issue? Is this network not supported?
please advise as I really need to use it on two networks at the same time.

Best Regards,

bela
